ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I think that the Innoruuk guilds with the largest high-level presence (which isn t exactly the same thing, but I suspect it s close enough) are, in no
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I think that the Innoruuk guilds with the largest high-level presence (which isn't exactly the same
thing, but I suspect it's close enough) are, in no particular order:

LoD (Legions of Darkness? never quite sure)
Pantheon (Sylly's?)
Storm
Order of the Black Staff (mine and Harmonic's)

OBS has about 140 not counting twinks. I think the others are in the ballpark. LoD is considered the
"uber-guild" of the server, for what that's worth.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 49.7 songs, Innoruuk (aargh, I'll never to 50, much less 60!)

PS - Feel free to send me a /tell if you have any questions. If I'm on. :)



Cheryl Kiraly wrote:

> > someone to remove himself from the guild last night, though, because he
> was clearly courting the #1 guild
>
> I am still new to EQ and Innoruuk as a whole so I have to ask... What
> guilds are considered the biggest? Because I play during the servers
> off-peak hours (Aussie time) I tend to see a lot of guilds with only one or
> two members in them. But with about 500 players on at the time there's not
> much to represent :)
>
> I am not asking because I want to be part of a "big" guild but just
> curious. I don't want to give anyone the wrong impression :) Besides my
> little one is already questing to join the guild most suited for her - size
> or not!
>
> Regards,
>
> Jacana - level 7 wood elf bard - If you ever see her around say hello :)
> She's chat with you for hours.
